content.title: Run the App
content.body:
1. From the left navigation bar of the Iris, click Run.
  2. In the previous hikes, you could access the Account form without any credentials. Now the app will ask for login credentials.
    Enter the following login credentials in your app:
    • Username: john.doe@woodburn.com
    • Password: VoltMX@123
  3. Click Login.
    The Account list appears.
  4. Click Logout.
    The Login form appears.
